org.fruit.alayer

Class Tag<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fruit.alayer.Tag<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class Tag<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Tags are labels that can be attached to Taggable objects. They are similar to keys in Map's. They have a name and a type and are associated with values who must be of that type.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
